General.Name: Online Blockchain PLC
General.Description: Online Blockchain Plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an incubator and invest in technology companies including internet and information businesses in the United Kingdom. The company acts as developers, administrators, and custodians of blockchains and cryptocurrencies. Online Blockchain Plc was formerly known as On-line plc and changed its name to Online Blockchain Plc in December 2017. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Ongar Business Centre, Ongar, United Kingdom, CM5 0GA
